articles.author: Dan Diamond, Tyler Pager
articles.title: Biden faces tough task of rallying exhausted Americans against omicron threat - The Washington Post
articles.description: But the president, who will not discuss lockdowns in his Tuesday speech, faces a tough time persuading vaccine and mask holdouts to  heed public health advice.
articles.content: Biden, who campaigned on a platform that some of the ravages of last years pandemic were preventable, is now faced with the challenge of explaining that omicron infections may be near-inevitable even… [+12475 chars]

articles.title: Samsung US lets you snatch discounted Z Fold3 and Flip3 Bespoke edition in Winter sales event - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The American division has seven deals for seven different devices, with one each day until Dec 26.
articles.content:
Samsung launched today its Discover Winter shopping campaign in the United States. It offers discounts, freebies and enhanced trade-in values when you get one of the company's latest foldables.
